page.title: 16Throws Farm,Stebbing
page.content: Dalgety own an experimental farm in our area.The farm test other companies' produce.Plants might take five to six years to be tested,maybe even ten years.It owns 480 acresand 62 acres are used for trials.It sells about 40,000 tons of grain a year and it rents 10 acres of land in Great Bardfield, also used for trials.The actual farm owns 40 acres, which is used for breeding new crops and testing.The farm does some very interesting experimenting,such as putting disease into greenhouses with plants so they can make plants stand up to the disease and develop chemicals to combat disease.
